content:
What a great idea! A hotel with a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal can be super convenient for your cruise departure. Here are some hotels near Miami International Airport (MIA) that offer a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami:

1. **Hyatt Regency Miami Airport**: This hotel offers a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal, as well as a shuttle to and from MIA airport.
2. **Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon**: This hotel provides a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal, and also offers a shuttle to and from MIA airport.
3. **Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport**: This hotel offers a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal, as well as a shuttle to and from MIA airport.
4. **Crowne Plaza Miami Airport**: This hotel provides a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal, and also offers a shuttle to and from MIA airport.
5. **La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Miami Airport East**: This hotel offers a free shuttle service to the Port of Miami cruise terminal, as well as a shuttle to and from MIA airport.

Please note that some hotels may have specific requirements or restrictions for the shuttle service, such as advance reservations or limited availability. I recommend checking with the hotel directly to confirm their shuttle policy and schedule before booking your stay.

Additionally, you may also consider hotels that offer a cruise package deal, which may include transportation to the Port of Miami, parking, and other perks. These packages can sometimes be a great value, so be sure to explore those options as well.

I hope this helps, and I wish you a wonderful cruise adventure!
